quote: Ms. Tewes supported us in our software project for years as a developer and UX designer with her expertise and skills.
author: Sascha Stephan

quote: With her expertise and commitment, she made a decisive contribution to the development of a modern self-service portal.
author: Dominik Wittenbeck

quote: Verena conducted a coaching session on TypeScript, React.js, CSS, Node.js, Express, UI and UX at SNP. It was practical, professional and perfectly tailored to the team.
author: Roman Zubkov

quote: With her technical expertise and creativity, Verena played a key role in developing an ABAP API for dynamic React applications.
author: Dominik Wittenbeck

quote: Ms. Tewes' work was always reliable and diligent. Change requests were handled professionally and implemented in the shortest possible time.
author: Frank Burkart
